KSWriteROOTConditionTerminatorBuilder.h
1 //
2 // Created by trost on 07.03.16.
3 //
4 
5 #ifndef KASPER_KSWRITEROOTCONDITIONTERMINATORBUILDER_H
6 #define KASPER_KSWRITEROOTCONDITIONTERMINATORBUILDER_H
7 #include "KComplexElement.hh"
8 #include "KSWriteROOTConditionTerminator.h"
9 #include "KToolbox.h"
10 #include "KSComponentGroup.h"
11 
12 
13 using namespace Kassiopeia;
14 namespace katrin
15 {
16 
17 class KSWriteROOTConditionTerminatorData
18 {
19 public:
20  std::string fName;
21  std::string fGroupName;
22  std::string fComponentName;
23  std::string fMatchTerminator;
24 };
25 
26 typedef KComplexElement< KSWriteROOTConditionTerminatorData > KSWriteROOTConditionTerminatorBuilder;
27 
28 template< >
29 inline bool KSWriteROOTConditionTerminatorBuilder::Begin()
30 {
31  fObject = new KSWriteROOTConditionTerminatorData;
32  return true;
33 }
34 
35 template< >
36 inline bool KSWriteROOTConditionTerminatorBuilder::AddAttribute( KContainer* aContainer )
37 {
38  if( aContainer->GetName() == "name" )
39  {
40  std::string tName = aContainer->AsReference< std::string >();
41  fObject->fName = tName;
42  return true;
43  }
44  if( aContainer->GetName() == "group" )
45  {
46  std::string tName = aContainer->AsReference< std::string >();
47  fObject->fGroupName = tName;
48  return true;
49  }
50  if( aContainer->GetName() == "parent" )
51  {
52  std::string tName = aContainer->AsReference< std::string >();
53  fObject->fComponentName = tName;
54  return true;
55  }
56  if( aContainer->GetName() == "match_terminator" )
57  {
58  std::string tMatchTerm = aContainer->AsReference< std::string >();
59  fObject->fMatchTerminator = tMatchTerm;
60  return true;
61  }
62  return false;
63 }
64 
65 template< >
66 inline bool KSWriteROOTConditionTerminatorBuilder::End()
67 {
68  KSComponent* tComponent = NULL;
69  if( fObject->fGroupName.empty() == false )
70  {
71  KSComponentGroup* tComponentGroup = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSComponentGroup >( fObject->fGroupName );
72  for( unsigned int tIndex = 0; tIndex < tComponentGroup->ComponentCount(); tIndex++ )
73  {
74  KSComponent* tGroupComponent = tComponentGroup->ComponentAt( tIndex );
75  if( tGroupComponent->GetName() == fObject->fComponentName )
76  {
77  tComponent = tGroupComponent;
78  break;
79  }
80  }
81  if( tComponent == NULL )
82  {
83  objctmsg( eError ) << "write ROOT condition terminator builder could not find component <" << fObject->fComponentName << "> in group <" << fObject->fGroupName << ">" << eom;
84  return false;
85  }
86  }
87  else
88  {
89  tComponent = KToolbox::GetInstance().Get< KSComponent >( fObject->fComponentName );
90  }
91 
92  KSWriteROOTCondition* tCondition = NULL;
93 
94  KSWriteROOTConditionTerminator* tWriteROOTConditionTerminator = new KSWriteROOTConditionTerminator();
95  tWriteROOTConditionTerminator->SetName( fObject->fName );
96  tWriteROOTConditionTerminator->SetValue( tComponent->As< std::string >() );
97  tWriteROOTConditionTerminator->SetMatchTerminator( fObject->fMatchTerminator );
98  tCondition = tWriteROOTConditionTerminator;
99  delete fObject;
100  Set( tCondition );
101  return true;
102 }
103 
104 }
105 
106 #endif //KASPER_KSWRITEROOTCONDITIONTERMINATORBUILDER_H
